Articles.Content:
:confused:This is my replica of the Titan IV rocket.

It can carry around 25 tons to LKO.

Just uses KW rocketry.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download:http: http://www./download/ehbl736ndw394lz/Titan+IV.craft

Sure, It looks cool. But I made a heavy lifter. and it is completely stock. ( I haven't any mods ). It can lift about 36 tons into roughly 300,000 by 300,000 kerbin orbit. It was meant to get 3 kerbonaughts to orbit the mun and return. But when your rocket sience is: Bigger load, more engines and fuel! And you are always going "Will it be enough?" you will always have over-engineered rockets. I adapted it to land on the mun, and later Minmus. I'm not a great pilot and I think It could lift more, especially if MechJeb helped, so I think it could easily get 50-70 tons into Lunar Orbit. I would upload it, but I don't know how. But It is huge.
This by no means a heavy lifter. It is just a replica. I could easily get 100 tons to LKO in a single launch but I'm trying to do some more replicating.
